The Europark Hotel is centrally located in the heart of the city surrounded by some of Barcelona's main attractions. The hotel is within walking distance of The Sagrada Familia, Placa Catalunya, Las Ramblas, and the Gothic quarter with the Cathedral and the Picasso Museum. Rooms feature modern and sophisticated decor combination of classic and contemporary style, black and white lacquered woods, glass, stainless steel and avant-garde furnishings like Verner Panton's Panton Chair.

This modern, value for money hotel is located in L'Hospitalet, opposite the Fira 2 congress centre and 8 kilometres from central Barcelona. Surrounded by the business district of La Pedrosa, the Travelodge Hospitalet provides simple, functional accommodation for those on a budget. It is located beside the new Gran Via 2 shopping mall and just a short drive from Montjuic Park. Convenient metro services connect the hotel to Barcelona's central Plaza Catalunya in about 15 minutes.

B-Hotel is a trendy boutique hotel in the heart of the city, with easy access to Las Ramblas and the beach. Guests will be able to enjoy spectacular views of Barcelona from the 8th floor swimming pool, decking with a bar and solarium. This hotel has won the avantgarde design award in 2005. The Tryp Condal Mar is a hotel where anyone can rest and feel nice. It's located in the new 22@ neighbourhood, which is 10 minute walk from the Mar Bella beach, the new congress palace and the shopping center.

Hotel located just a 10-minute walk from the beach in the modern Forum area, next to CCIB (International Convention Centre) and with very good access to the harbour and the city centre. All guests have free access to the 2 heated outdoor pools, sauna, gym and jacuzzi. The pool on the 23rd floor offers stunning panoramic views of the city. Rooms at the 4-star Barcelona Princess have impressive views out over Barcelona and offer free drinks from the minibar.

The Hotel Vincci Arena is a new boutique hotel located near the Plaza de Espana and the commercial district, making it an ideal base from which to explore this cosmopolitan city. Just 4 metro stops from Las Ramblas, the hotel is steps away from the main train and coach station of Barcelona-Sants, making the whole of Barcelona easily accessible. Set in a historical building, this top-class hotel has been stylishly decorated in a modern style and to a very high standard.

Plaça Rosa dels Vents, 1 Final de Passeig Joan de Borbo

Designed by world-renowned architect Ricardo Bofill, W Barcelona is located on the beachfront along the famous Barceloneta boardwalk and features 473 guest rooms, including 67 suites. W Barcelona also offers Spain's first Bliss spa; restaurant BRAVO by Carles Abellan with unparalleled views of the Barcelona shoreline; Eclipse rooftop bar from London-based nightlife gurus Ignite Group; the signature W living room experience; Wet infinity-edged pool; and Sweat state-of-the-art fitness facility.

<a href="http://globaltrips.lastminute.com/trips/productDetailsInternal?roomOptions=true&amp;pTxId=777276&amp;checkInDate=2011-12-11&amp;checkOutDate=2011-12-13&amp;guestCounts=1&amp;tabId=information&amp;guestCodes=ADULT&amp;propertyIds=1055014-1-2-EXT%3A145428%24v1v%24&amp;configId=S72722479&amp;city=barcelona&amp;numRooms=1&amp;dest=BCN&amp;_gsid=S72722479-T080V095801470607638469630520101391835&amp;path=hotels&amp;hotelRequestId=319505160625018&amp;mappingName=#"><img src="http://cdn2.travelpn.com.edgesuite.net/trips/11.05.1/brand/lastminute/img/tsh.png" class="hotel-thumbnail" alt="Modern Hotel Close to the Beach - 4* - Barcelona" title="Modern Hotel Close to the Beach - 4* - Barcelona"></a>

This hotel is a great destination if you are planning to relax during your holidays. The hotel provides high standard facilities and services to make your stay an unforgettable one, all this within walking distance from the beach. An ideal hotel for the business or leisure traveller.

<a href="http://globaltrips.lastminute.com/trips/productDetailsInternal?roomOptions=true&amp;pTxId=777276&amp;checkInDate=2011-12-11&amp;checkOutDate=2011-12-13&amp;guestCounts=1&amp;tabId=information&amp;guestCodes=ADULT&amp;propertyIds=1076340-1-2-EXT%3A158794%24v1v%24&amp;configId=S72722479&amp;city=barcelona&amp;numRooms=1&amp;dest=BCN&amp;_gsid=S72722479-T080V095801470607638469630520101391835&amp;path=hotels&amp;hotelRequestId=319505160625018&amp;mappingName=#"><img src="http://cdn2.travelpn.com.edgesuite.net/trips/11.05.1/brand/lastminute/img/tsh.png" class="hotel-thumbnail" alt="Perfect deal with rooftop pool next to the beach - 4* - Barcelona" title="Perfect deal with rooftop pool next to the beach - 4* - Barcelona"></a>

object.name: hotel_output_data
object.attribute: The best deal for a luxury experience in Barcelona - 5* - Barcelona

<a href="http://globaltrips.lastminute.com/trips/productDetailsInternal?roomOptions=true&amp;pTxId=777276&amp;checkInDate=2011-12-11&amp;checkOutDate=2011-12-13&amp;guestCounts=1&amp;tabId=information&amp;guestCodes=ADULT&amp;propertyIds=1000340238-1-5-GH%3A1%24v1v%24&amp;configId=S72722479&amp;city=barcelona&amp;numRooms=1&amp;dest=BCN&amp;_gsid=S72722479-T080V095801470607638469630520101391835&amp;path=hotels&amp;hotelRequestId=319505160625018&amp;mappingName=#"><img src="http://cdn2.travelpn.com.edgesuite.net/trips/11.05.1/brand/lastminute/img/tsh.png" class="hotel-thumbnail" alt="Luxurious Hotel with spectacular rooftop pool - 4* - Barcelona" title="Luxurious Hotel with spectacular rooftop pool - 4* - Barcelona"></a>

Enjoy the luxury in this magnificent hotel with very comfortable rooms and outstanding design. Located near the sea and about 10 minutes from the city centre by public transport. Great setting with spectacular views of both the city and the Mediterranean sea, ideal for relaxing after a busy day.
